txt.en: Collected stolen map scraps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Open the old coffer and remove the treasure inside
This must be the location of Frothard's hidden treasure
Collect all the stolen map scraps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Frothard Took can be found in the village of Tighfield.\n\nYou should bring the golf clubs to Frothard Took.

'Ah! Of course! I remember now!

'I buried my golf clubs to keep them safe while Foxden Heath was being tidied up and restored so it could serve as a golfing course once again!'

You ask why he buried the clubs instead of keeping them safe in his shed, and he laughs.

'Are you quite mad? I can't keep them in there: the shrews are always getting into that shed!'

'Hobbits,' you think to yourself.
Frothard's map was stolen and torn up by shrews in Yondershire.\n\nYou should collect all the stolen map scraps from shrews in Yondershire.
The map to Bounder Frothard Took's hidden treasure was recently stolen!
You find an old coffer buried in the ground!

'Ah! Of course! I remember now!

'I buried my golf clubs to keep them safe while Foxden Heath was being tidied up and restored so it could serve as a golfing course once again!'

You ask why he buried the clubs instead of keeping them safe in his shed, and he laughs.

'Are you quite mad? I can't keep them in there: the shrews are always getting into that shed!'

'Yonder-hobbits,' you think to yourself.

'Ah! Of course! I remember now!

'I buried my golf clubs to keep them safe while Foxden Heath was being tidied up and restored so it could serve as a golfing course once again!'

You ask why he buried the clubs instead of keeping them safe in his shed, and he laughs.

'Are you quite mad? I can't keep them in there: the shrews are always getting into that shed!'

'Yonder-hobbits,' you think to yourself. You catch a curious glint in Frothard's eye and know that he is thinking something similar about you: 'River Hobbits,' like as not.
The location of the hidden treasure is in the woods east of the village of Gamwich.\n\nYou should find the hidden treasure.
The treasure is... a set of old golf clubs?
Frothard Took can be found in the Village of Tighfield.\n\nYou should bring the map scraps to Frothard Took.
Shrews' Clues
Bring the map scraps to Frothard Took
The location of the hidden treasure is in the woods east of the village of Gamwich.\n\nYou should dig up the hidden treasure.

'I am a little embarrassed, [placeholder], but perhaps you can help me with something?

'I have always kept my Bounder supplies within a small shed, and never thought I needed to worry that someone might break in... but that very thing has happened! And I know the identities of the culprits!'

Frothard turns a bright pink.

'It's shrews, [placeholder]. They burrowed right under the wall of my shed and made a terrible mess. Worse still, they ran off with an important map of mine, and they have likely torn it all to pieces by now! Can you find all the pieces of the map and return them to me so I can put it back together?'
Bring the golf clubs to Frothard Took

'You found every scrap of the map! Wonderful!

'You see, this map holds the location of a treasure that I buried for safekeeping many years ago! It was so many years ago that I have, er, rather forgotten what the treasure was, but with the map restored I will be able to dig it up and find out!

'It had to be something valuable... why else would I have drawn a map? Follow the map and dig up the treasure, [placeholder]! I am very curious to learn what I thought to hide!'
Dig up the hidden treasure
The location of the hidden treasure is in the woods east of the village of Gamwich.\n\nYou should open the old coffer and remove the treasure inside.
Find the hidden treasure
